short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poshwatch makes it easy to share your closet, get more followers, and increase your sales on Poshmark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're tired of spending all day on Poshmark sharing your items, following others, and managing your closet just to make a few more sales, we've got you covered.

With Poshwatch Automation, you can automatically share your items, gain more followers, and boost your sales effortlessly. Plus, you can generate likes and offer your items to new potential buyers every day.

Ready to streamline your Poshmark experience? Let's get started with Poshwatch Automation!

Features:
✨ Automatically share your closet
👥 Follow new users
🚫 Unfollow users
💌 Automatically send offers to likers
👚 Optimize your listings with the listing analyzer
⏰ Schedule when to share (Coming soon)
🇺🇸 🇨🇦 Supports poshmark.com and poshmark.ca
